original_text: a land in which you will eat bread without scarcity, in which you will lack nothing, a land whose stones are iron, and out of whose hills you can dig copper.
korean_text: 네가 먹을 것에 모자람이 없고 네게 아무 부족함이 없는 땅이며 그 땅의 돌은 철이요 산에서는 동을 캘 것이라

sentences.original_text: a land in which you will eat bread without scarcity
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 빈곤 없이 빵을 먹을 땅

sentences.original_text: in which you will lack nothing
a land whose stones are iron
out of whose hills you can dig copper
sentences.korean_translation: 그 언덕에서 구리를 캘 수 있는 곳
